This is a list of Paleolithic sites in China. They are sorted in chronological order from the earliest founding to the latest:

The list[edit]

This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.
English name Chinese name Modern-day location
Shangchen Lantian County, Shaanxi
Bose Basin Guangxi of southern China
He County 和县 Anhui
Xihoudu 西侯渡 Shanxi
Yuanmou County 元谋县 Yunnan
Xiaochangliang 小長梁 Nihewan Basin in Yangyuan County, Hebei
Zhoukoudian 周口店 Beijing
Yuchanyan Cave Dao County, Hunan
Xianren Cave 仙人洞 Dayuan Village, Wannian County, Jiangxi
Damaidi 大麥地 Small village in Zhongwei, Ningxia, set amid the Weining Mountains on the north bend of the Yellow River
